Title: Independ
Description: The Independ is a lightweight dependency injection container with support for constructor and property call injection written in .NET 4 especially for Windows Phone 7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Independ is a lightweight dependency injection container with support for constructor and property call injection written in .NET 4 especially for Windows Phone 7.


Features:
  1. Clear interfce compatible with Unity
  2. Constructor with maximum parameters count injection
  3. Stated constructor injection (see InjectionConstructorAttribute)
  4. Property injection (see DependencyAttribute)
  5. Hierarchical resolve
  6. Implementation of IServiceLocator interface
  7. Fluent interface
  8. Supports Windows Phone 7!
